concept.definition: In XML, this property is represented as an attribute not an element.

description: How a property is represented on the wire.
name: PropertyRepresentation

text.div:
PropertyRepresentation

How a property is represented on the wire.

This value set has an inline code system http://hl7.org/fhir/property-representation, which defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
xmlAttr XML AttributeIn XML, this property is represented as an attribute not an element.
